channel.title: Wordpress on Rob Bevan
channel.description: Recent content in Wordpress on Rob Bevan

item.title: Blog Resolutions 2006
item.description: Apart from the obvious need/desire to post more often, here’s a bunch of improvements I want to make to this blog in the coming weeks. I was hoping to get some of this done during ‘ketchup’ week, but family, friends and a bumper crop of BAFTA screeners were welcome distractions. Upgrade to WordPress 2.0.1 I’ve been localhostin’ the beta for some time, and keeping up with it on wordpress.com, but now it and Steve Smith’s Tiger Admin plugin are out and there are fixes/workarounds for the WP 2.
